definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
see 天涯海角[tian1 ya2 hai3 jiao3]
quiet, silent, and lonely/far and indistinct/gone without a trace
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
ten thousand crags and torrents (idiom); the trials and tribulations of a long journey/a long and difficult road
lit. the goose comes, the swallow goes (idiom); fig. always on the move
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
lit. clouds scatter, wind flows (idiom); the crisis settles down/people disperse home/things return to normal
lit. amidst the flowers under the moonlight (idiom)/fig. romantic surroundings
